State.Author: The Community
State.Description: A collection of fixes made by the community over the years, with open permissions.
State.Name: Community Fixes Merged

State.Author: reg2k and Neanka
State.Description: The Extended Dialogue Interface removes the hardcoded 4-option limit on dialogue and adds full engine support for any number of player dialogue options.
State.Name: Extended Dialogue Interface

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Balances the environmental effects on all base game and DLC transparent material files.
State.Name: Gloomy Glass - All transparent materials revised

State.Author: Old Nick
State.Description:
Prevents the Berry Mentats effect from highlighting your current companion and disables the effect entirely while your weapon is holstered or you are in dialogue.



Also includes the fix to stop the effect from turning certain neutral NPCs hostile.
State.Name: Less Annoying Berry Mentats

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: A simple framework that allows mod authors to safely use the base game's random encounter story manager.
State.Name: Random Encounter Framework

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Balance overhaul inspired by the mod "Thrive" and "Fallout 4 Balance Patch", both made by BourneMcReady. Fixes balance issues with the original game and makes it more challenging by removing shortcuts and silly mechanics.
State.Name: Thrive Redone

State.Author: CaptainCockerel
State.Description: No more elastic waves in the Commonwealth. Brand new effects and textures with a more realistic motion.
State.Name: WAVE - Wave Animation Vanilla Enhanced

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This small mod fixes the exaggerated shine of specific objects while it's raining.
State.Name: Wetness Shader Fix

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: F4SE Team
State.Description: The Fallout 4 Script Extender, or F4SE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout 4. It does so without modifying the executable files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Script Extender (F4SE)

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: This mod allows preload F4SE plugins before the game initializes.
State.Name: xSE PluginPreloader F4

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine
State.Name: Buffout 4

State.Author: Snapdragon
State.Description: Fixes the engine bug that causes workshop navmesh cuts to persist throughout all interior cells.
State.Name: Interior NavCut Fix

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: powerofthree
State.Description: F4SE plugin that prevents neutral NPCs from turning hostile when you accidentally hit them.
State.Name: Simple Offence Suppression F4

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This small mod fixes 2 wrong textures for normal green Protectrons (only needed for HD DLC), a wrong texture path for the Medic Protectron and a wrong texture path for Robobrain deault color (useful for vanilla and HD DLC).
State.Name: Fixed Protectron Textures

State.Author: ossumpossum
State.Description: Corrects material files to use the intended texture for certain rocks
State.Name: Northern Foothills Rocks Fix

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
RobCo Patcher, is a patcher based on F4SE and CommonLibF4, which allows mod authors and users to modify game data without the use of plugins.

You can modify ammos, npcs, races, weapons and more.
State.Name: RobCo Patcher

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Enhanced Vanilla Clothing and Armor (EVAC) is a complete overhaul of the appearance of armor and clothing.
State.Name: Enhanced Vanilla Armor and Clothing - EVAC

Original.Name: Guard Post Animation Replacer No More Finger Guns-72363-1-0-1687481276.rar

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Small tweaks to the Guard Post animation to close the hand that was supposed to be holding a gun. No more finger guns!
State.Name: Guard Post Animation Tweak - No More Finger Guns

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: Have you ever noticed the billboards you can see from inside Diamond City only exist while you're inside the stadium? This mod fixes that.
State.Name: Diamond City Billboards

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Categorize and sort your MCM Menu by Drag-and-Drop! Allows you to add your own categories into MCM. You can put any mod where you like to have it, in any order! Also comes with fancy icons and a compressed list view! Also various more Quality-of-Life features for navigating MCM.
State.Name: MCM Categorizer - Sorter Folder Categories

State.Author: VishVadeva - Audixas
State.Description: Fixes incorrect or missing ownership data assigned to junk and containers.
State.Name: Ownership Fixes

State.Author: StamperDoesMods
State.Description: This plugin reduces the frequency of power armor in Fallout 4 by script-injecting leveled items into the two main power armor leveled lists. This preserves compatibility and removes the chance for any of the issues prevalent in other similar mods.
State.Name: SPARS - Simple Power Armor Reduction System

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Allows the NPCs to use heal and buff items like, Jet, Psycho, Buffout etc.

Makes combat even more interesting, when NPCs can now buff and heal themselves!

With MCM, which allows you to configure the mod!

<Requires RobCo Patcher>
State.Name: NPCs Use Items

State.Author: dpillari
State.Description: added correct PBR data to the Marine Combat Armor, as it lacked it before.
State.Name: Marine Combat Armor Material Fix

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: Adjusts Goodneighbor so that the inside and outside of the town better match each other.
State.Name: Goodneighbor View

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
You are in the middle of a fire fight, you are near death. You take all the courage you got left and run to the next cover. But then, you get hit. A message box appears. 

"Your health is low! Use a Stimpak, eat some food, or drink some water."

You click ok, then you are dead. You just got killed by the message box.

Let's fix that!
State.Name: Less intrusive tutorial

State.Author: IceKK
State.Description: Disabled Mouse Acceleration, Horizontal/Vertical Parity, Scalable ADS Multiplier, Normalized Sensitivity
State.Name: RAW INPUT - The Ultimate Mouse Sensitivity Fix

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for showing holstered weapons on characters, with various customization options.
State.Name: Classic Holstered Weapons System (CHW)

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Fixes an issue with the Jet script by Bethesda. 

If any NPC consumes a Jet item on survival difficulty, it will add thirst to the player. This mod contains only the fixed script as loose file. No  ESP, No ESL. Easy and clean.
State.Name: Jet Script Bug Fix

State.Author: AntoniX
State.Description:
Fixed twitching/stuttering when sprinting in first person.



Исправление дрожания камеры от первого лица при спринте.
State.Name: Sprint Stuttering Fix

State.Author: Sheson
State.Description: Block god rays shining through the ground with terrain underside meshes for Commonwealth, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Terrain Undersides - 2 Million Sunblock

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: FO4 Particle Patch is a comprehensive mod that updates hundreds of mesh and material files to make fog, smoke, water, blood, dirt puffs, dust (and much more) glow in the dark less, and better utilize ambient & point lighting. Also improves distance rendering for Far Harbor fog effects.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Particle Patch - No More Glowing Objects

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!
State.Name: MCM Settings Manager

State.Author: underthesky and PK0
State.Description: NPCs will not speak greetings towards the Nate/Nora's back. F4SE
State.Name: To Your Face FO4

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description: F4SE plugin to fix long loading times. Also some settings for loading screens.
State.Name: Long Loading Times Fix

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Power Armor is now able to absorb and prevent damage. Each armor part will work individually and absorb the damage of the body part it covers. Once the armor parts start to break, you can take damage on the body part that got exposed. Some weapons are also able to penetrate armor and deal damage to the wearer.
State.Name: Bastion - A Power Armor Overhaul

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Reduces MCM loading time to nearly instant loading
State.Name: MCM Booster

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which restores some hard-coded features disabled by game in survival mode,for example,unlock console,enable TGM,enable fast travel,restore vanilla compass settings,enalbe quick save and auto save,etc .
State.Name: Unlimited Survival Mode - F4SE

State.Author: Bingle
State.Description: Fixes some glitches related to 3rd person behavior
State.Name: 3rd Person Behavior Fixes

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Fallout 4 melee combat will change forever. Blocking Overhaul revamps the Fallout 4s blocking system on the engine level.
State.Name: Blocking Overhaul

Original.Name: Community Fixes Merged - BPA Redux Patch-74945-1-0-1695594248.7z

State.Author: The Community
State.Description: A collection of fixes made by the community over the years, with open permissions.
State.Name: Community Fixes Merged

State.Author: Jonx0r
State.Description: DLC Timing allows you to delay the official DLC until you're ready for them. This mod allows you to change the starting conditions for Automatron, Far Harbor, Nuka World and Vault-Tec Workshop independently to suit your playthrough.
State.Name: DLC Timing

Original.Name: Who's The General - Minutemen Quest Cleanup-59019-1-05-1674786975.zip

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: A mod for players who dislike being asked to report back to Preston Garvey.
State.Name: Who's The General - Minutemen Quest Cleanup

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: This mod adds new commands and overhauls existing commands within the console.
State.Name: Console Commands Extender

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Vanilla NPC drinking animations are missing sounds and facial animations. This MOD fix this. For a little immersion.
State.Name: NPC Drinking Fix

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Have you ever wondered why you have to pick up the item first in order to use it? Well, this mod allows you to use it right away.
State.Name: Let Me Use That

State.Author: BenRierimanu
State.Description: Full rebuild of precombined meshes and occlusion (previs) information for Fallout 4, reducing draw calls everywhere, which depending on location, should increase frames per second compared to the vanilla game, and also includes any relevant bug fixes I can find and fix not already handled by UF4OP. Requires Season Pass / All main DLC.
State.Name: Previsibines Repair Pack (PRP) Stable Branch

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Fixes numerous texture sizing, coloration and specular errors, with the help of AI upscaling and other sources from around the Nexus.
State.Name: Targeted Textures - Vanilla textures upscaled fixed and sized

State.Author: frogs345
State.Description: Fixes a number of small and major bugs in vanilla mods.
State.Name: Weapon Mod Fixes - WMF

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Improve the performance of DeadEye weapon. Add detailed sounds and screen effects. No more stupid text message. No plugin.
State.Name: Deadeye Weapon Effect Fix

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Provides version independent IDs used for dynamically relocating offsets at runtime.
State.Name: Address Library for F4SE Plugins

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description:
A F4SE plugin that allows you to disable the hardcoded, vision-obscuring shader effect at various workbenches so you can actually see what you're crafting.



Also allows you to change the shader effect for the Power Armor station and robot workbenches to a outline-only shader instead of a full shader.
State.Name: Crafting Highlight Fix

State.Author: dpillari
State.Description: the wetsuit provided with Far harbor lacks any environmental mask(reflective data) in its material file. so i rewrote it to have the correct PBR data.
State.Name: Marine Wet suit Material Fix

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Simply adds arms to the first person running animations, open and closed hand styles available. Includes Power Armor. Archive, loose files, or empty ESL versions.
State.Name: First-Person Running with Hands Animations

State.Author: The Community
State.Description: A collection of fixes made by the community over the years, with open permissions.
State.Name: Community Fixes Merged

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: This mod addresses a bug with the Armor Penetration System. It prevents incorrect stat overwriting when unequipping or changing weapons, ensuring accurate and consistent gameplay experience. F4SE only
State.Name: Armor Penetration Bug Fix - F4SE

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: DirectHit is an engine based damage calculation overhaul. This mod adds real locational damage, known from games like Tarkov or Arma. The damage is calculated against the body part you hit and the armor that covers it. This also covers power armor. Power Armor will negate damage completely until it parts break.
State.Name: DirectHit

State.Author: Nukem
State.Description: A bug fix for one of the common causes of long save/autosave times.
State.Name: Long Save Bug Fix

State.Author: Snapdragon and GELUXRUM
State.Description: Engine bug fix to prevent NPCs from defaulting their outfits.
State.Name: Outfit ReDress Fix

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Files needed while following The Midnight Ride.
State.Name: The Midnight Ride Resources

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: HUDFramework is a UI framework that makes it possible for mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.
State.Name: HUDFramework

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Lightweight lighting aims to be an all in one simple Vanilla + Lighting overhaul. All while being as compatible as can be with no cell edits.
State.Name: Lightweight Lighting - A weather and interior lighting overhaul

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: Some ports from Papyrus Tweaks NG for Fallout 4.
State.Name: Baka MaxPapyrusOps

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: Speeds up game start by storing INI files in memory instead of opening, parsing and closing the file each time some value from it is needed.
State.Name: PrivateProfileRedirector F4 - Faster game start (INI file cacher)

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Fixed crashes caused by Weapon Debris setting



Исправление вылетов при включенной настройке "Осколки от выстрелов"
State.Name: Weapon Debris Crash Fix

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Simply adds arms to the first person swimming animations. Archive, loose files, or empty ESL available.
State.Name: First-Person Swimming Animations

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for UFO4P and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (UFO4P)

State.Author: david88m
State.Description: Small change that removes the blurring effect in weapons sight.
State.Name: Remove Ironsight Blur

State.Author: The Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch - UFO4P

Original.Name: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth Patch-59019-1-00-1648046534.zip

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: A mod for players who dislike being asked to report back to Preston Garvey.
State.Name: Who's The General - Minutemen Quest Cleanup

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Swap the "quest items can't be removed" message with something a little more informative.
State.Name: Whose Quest Is It Anyway

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Experience enhanced chaos with 'Chemfluence: AI Combat Dynamics' for Fallout 4. Watch as AI adversaries adapt combat styles based on weapon choices and chem consumption, injecting thrilling unpredictability into every battle.
State.Name: Chemfluence - AI Combat Dynamics

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Known from Skyrim and other games, many vendors are restricted. You can't sell everything to anyone. This also prevents the player from piling up currency. This mod applies several restrictions to several NPCs. For example, a doctor can only buy and sell chem related items. But there are still some stores, where you can dump everything.
State.Name: Complex Vendors

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This mod fixes artefacts, pixelation and color banding in textures that are used for special light effects. Zero performance loss, little to nothing strain for your VRAM, no esp needed, no reason to not use it.
State.Name: Fixed Gobo Effects

State.Author: BenRierimanu
State.Description: Full rebuild of precombined meshes and occlusion (previs) information for Fallout 4, reducing draw calls everywhere, which depending on location, should increase frames per second compared to the vanilla game, and also includes any relevant bug fixes I can find and fix not already handled by UF4OP. Requires Season Pass / All main DLC.
State.Name: Previsibines Repair Pack (PRP) Stable Branch

State.Author: Yeti
State.Description: This mod attempts to stop NPC's from walking away from you mid conversation. It also alters some of the animations that NPC's have to leave to talk to you. esp flagged as esl.
State.Name: Im Talking to You

State.Author: VishVadeva - Audixas
State.Description: Makes weapon scrapping return a wider range of materials based on what they are actually made of and with balanced amounts.
State.Name: Weapon Scrapping Redone

State.Author: VG
State.Description: A mod that fixes some reloading issues.
State.Name: Reload Fix

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Patches for UFO4P and more.
State.Name: Vish's Patch Hub (UFO4P)

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Fixes the old problem with water puddles and blood pools flickering and flashing when looking at them from certain angles.
State.Name: Simple Puddle Reflection Flicker Fix (Water and Blood)

State.Author: Glitchfinder
State.Description: This mod is a merged All-In-One of several fixes I've made, created for use in The Midnight Ride.
State.Name: The Midnight Ride - Glitchfinder All-In-One

State.Author: CaptainCockerel
State.Description: WET enhances all water and most water-related effects in the game. From one of the creators of the popular Realistic Water Two mod for Skyrim.
State.Name: WET - Water Enhancement Textures

Original.Name: Sniper Scope Overlay And Reticle Replacement-29922-1-0.zip

State.Author: deleted29017635
State.Description: Overlay replacement for the standard aim through scope effect and reticles (Ballistic and plasma rifle scope only).
State.Name: Sniper Scope Overlay And Reticles Replacement

State.Author: Ea6t
State.Description: Allows encounter zone levels to be recalculated after initial entry.
State.Name: Encounter Zone Recalculation (Continuous Level Scaling)

State.Author: battlebrother13
State.Description:
When a bobby pin breaks in a lock, the next pin will be at the same angle instead of resetting every time. Makes lockpicking less of a hassle without removing the challenge entirely.

Updated version of OnlyIWeDo's mod.
State.Name: Remember Lockpick Angle - Updated

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Makes clothing scrapping return a wider range of materials based on what they are actually made of and with balanced amounts.
State.Name: Clothing Scrapping Redone

State.Author: GELUXRUM
State.Description: F4SE plugin to enable friendly fire between NPCs
State.Name: Friendly Fire

State.Author: Bingle
State.Description: Fixes the magic effect condition bug that happens when you have a perk/ability for too long. Fallout 4 port of BugFixesSSE (partial)
State.Name: MGEF Condition Bug Fix

State.Author: ScottyDoesKnow
State.Description: Removes ammo from guns on corpses and adds it to the corpse's inventory.
State.Name: Remove Ammo from Dropped Guns

Original.Name: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth UFO4P Version-56089-1-2-1670779314.7z

State.Author: VishVadeva
State.Description: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth but for unofficial patch users.
State.Name: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth UFO4P Version

State.Author: LarannKiar
State.Description: Makes the shader effect to an outline-only effect in Workshop Mode.
State.Name: Outline Workshop Highlight Only

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: deleted29017635
State.Description: Overlay replacement for the standard aim through scope effect and reticles (Ballistic and plasma rifle scope only).
State.Name: Sniper Scope Overlay And Reticles Replacement
